description1: To maintain security standards and regulatory compliance, we now require wallet address verification for all users.
deadlineText: Starting from {date}, any unverified wallet will be
cooperationText: We appreciate your cooperation in keeping our platform secure.
modalWarningText: Your recovery phrase is the master key to your wallet. Never disclose it to anyone or enter it on any website.
signsList: Shared it with someone claiming to be support
actionList: Transfer all funds to a new secure wallet immediately
Generate a completely new recovery phrase
Never reuse any version of the old phrase
modalNote: Note: {websiteName} will never ask for your recovery phrase. This verification process only requires your public wallet address.
